subtitles.text: I'm Kotomi Tachibana, the red color person in charge of Candy Tune.
I don't know what it is about my personality.
I'm a competitive person, and I feel that I hate to lose.
I don't want to compromise on every single thing, and when I decide to do something, I'll do it until I'm satisfied with it.
There are good things and there are also bad things.
I also feel that way.

I'm often told that I'm strange or that I don't communicate well with them.
